description: This source file implements the core functions of the Ansc Lpcco Tcp Object, including initialization, unload, accept, set output, remove, query, process synchronization and asynchronous, send completion, and notification handling. It appears to be part of a network services framework, handling TCP socket operations and managing connection states.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoInit(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the TCP object, currently a no-op returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoUnload(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Unloads or cleans up resources for the TCP object, currently a no-op returning success.

methods.name: BOOL AnscLpccoTcpDwoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles accepting a new TCP connection, allocates a buffer descriptor for incoming data, associates it with the socket, and returns TRUE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoSetOut(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Sets output preferences or configurations for the socket, currently a no-op.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes or cleans up a TCP connection, frees buffer descriptors, updates connection state, and manages timers accordingly.

methods.name: ULONG AnscLpccoTcpDwoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data buffers, manages message boundaries based on protocol headers, and determines processing modes such as finish, discard, or collect.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Synchronous processing of received data, not applicable in this implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Asynchronous data processing, not applicable in this implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Callback after sending data, currently a no-op returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpDwoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles socket events like errors, closure, timeouts, by invoking relevant socket methods.
